query:
SELECT '[[Datei:item_' || items.name || '.png|zentriert|frameless|64x64px]]' AS Bild, items.name AS Name, items.name AS ID, category AS Kategorie, stacksize AS 'Stapel-
gr√∂sse', hungerrestore AS 'Hunger
restore', thirstrestore AS 'Durst
restore', healthrestore AS 'Gesundheit
restore', mass AS Gewicht, '#Version#' || items.name AS 'Ab Version' FROM items INNER JOIN consumeinfo ON items.name=consumeinfo.itemname WHERE items.name NOT NULL AND items.assetpath NOT NULL order by name
